issue.title: Gazebo simulation freezes on right click with this world file.

content.raw:
You can easily check the version on the GUI by going on `Help` -> `About` or on the command line by running on verbose mode `$gazebo --verbose`.

I didn't find any reference to `1.4` in the tutorial you linked. On the tutorial's top-right it says it is for version `4.0` and at "Build and Install Gazebo" it tells you to use the 4.0 branch.
content.html:
You can easily check the version on the GUI by going on Help -> About or on the command line by running on verbose mode $gazebo --verbose.

I didn't find any reference to 1.4 in the tutorial you linked. On the tutorial's top-right it says it is for version 4.0 and at "Build and Install Gazebo" it tells you to use the 4.0 branch.
